entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:28 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 1:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -15.9°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
